settings.title: Settings
settings.lower_is_more_sensitive: Lower is more sensitive. Increase if too noisy.

manual.install_desc: Add Rhythm Trainer to your home screen for the best experience (fullscreen, no URL bar).
manual.ios_instruction: Tap the Share button in Safari, then scroll down and select "Add to Home Screen".
manual.android_instruction: Tap the menu icon (‚ãÆ) and select "Install App" or "Add to Home Screen".
manual.silent_switch_desc: If you are on an iPhone, please turn OFF the Silent Switch. If it is ON, you might not hear the click or recording might fail.
manual.latency_desc: Wireless earphones (Bluetooth) introduce delay. Perform Auto Check to sync audio.
manual.latency_step3: The app will play beeps and listen to them.
manual.gain_desc: Adjust microphone sensitivity so hits are detected but noise is not.
manual.auto_set_desc: In Settings, tap Auto Set. Quietly wait, then hit the pad 5 times.
manual.manual_adj_desc: Increase Gain until hits are detected. Increase Threshold if ghost hits occur.
manual.training_step4: Play along! Check accuracy in real-time.
manual.visualizer_desc: Green = Perfect. Orange = Early/Late. Red = Miss/Poor.
manual.history_desc: Check past stats to analyze stability and rushing/dragging tendencies.

calibration.mic_error_no_signal: No signal detected. Try increasing Gain.
calibration.mic_error_bleed: Click sound is louder than pad. Move mic closer or reduce speaker volume.

toast.silent_mode_warning: The iPhone Silent Switch may be ON. If you don't hear any sound, please turn OFF the Silent Switch.
